item.description:

Anyways, After adding the shop I get 100 errors, and when I removed the code, It fixed it, anyways heres the code incase I did something wrong, (By the way I have no others of these codes, so i need to add it)

else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Special itemâ€™s
PutNPCCoords = true;
